mapper.select: select m.id, m.name, m.reg_date, sum(case when o.id=m.id then o.totalcost end) as totalcost from member m ,orders o group by m.id, m.name, m.reg_date order by m.id
select m.id, m.name, count(case when v.id=m.id then v.visit_date end) as visit from member m, visitor v group by m.id, m.name order by m.id
select id, name, phone, postcode, address, detailaddress, reg_date from member where id=#{id}
select sum(case when id=#{id} then totalcost end) as memberTotalCost from orders where id=#{id}
select count(case when id=#{id} then visit_date end) as memberTotalVisit from visitor where id=#{id}
select count(*) as coupon from coupon where id = #{id}
select max(visit_date) as visit_Date from VISITOR where id = #{id}

select count(case when op.status = '1' then 1 end) as status1, count(case when op.status = '2' then 1 end) as status2, count(case when op.status = '3' then 1 end) as status3, count(case when op.status = '4' then 1 end) as status4, count(case when op.status = '5' then 1 end) as status5, count(case when op.status = '6' then 1 end) as status6, count(case when op.status = '7' then 1 end) as status7, count(case when op.status = '8' then 1 end) as status8 from orderedProduct op, orders o where o.id=#{id} and op.o_number=o.o_number

select count(case when to_char(visit_date,'MM') = '01' then 1 end) as mvisit1, count(case when to_char(visit_date,'MM') = '02' then 1 end) as mvisit2, count(case when to_char(visit_date,'MM') = '03' then 1 end) as mvisit3, count(case when to_char(visit_date,'MM') = '04' then 1 end) as mvisit4, count(case when to_char(visit_date,'MM') = '05' then 1 end) as mvisit5, count(case when to_char(visit_date,'MM') = '06' then 1 end) as mvisit6, count(case when to_char(visit_date,'MM') = '07' then 1 end) as mvisit7, count(case when to_char(visit_date,'MM') = '08' then 1 end) as mvisit8, count(case when to_char(visit_date,'MM') = '09' then 1 end) as mvisit9, count(case when to_char(visit_date,'MM') = '10' then 1 end) as mvisit10 from visitor where id=#{id}

select sum(case when to_char(o_date,'MM') = '01' then totalCost end) as mtotal1, sum(case when to_char(o_date,'MM') = '02' then totalCost end) as mtotal2, sum(case when to_char(o_date,'MM') = '03' then totalCost end) as mtotal3, sum(case when to_char(o_date,'MM') = '04' then totalCost end) as mtotal4, sum(case when to_char(o_date,'MM') = '05' then totalCost end) as mtotal5, sum(case when to_char(o_date,'MM') = '06' then totalCost end) as mtotal6, sum(case when to_char(o_date,'MM') = '07' then totalCost end) as mtotal7, sum(case when to_char(o_date,'MM') = '08' then totalCost end) as mtotal8, sum(case when to_char(o_date,'MM') = '09' then totalCost end) as mtotal9, sum(case when to_char(o_date,'MM') = '10' then totalCost end) as mtotal10 from orders where id=#{id}
